def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_xy_large_grey = is_large(x, ctx) and is_grey(x, ctx)
        check_x_center = is_middle(x, None, ctx)
        check_y_dark_grey = is_dark(y, ctx) and is_grey(y, ctx)
        check_y_southwest_x = get_bottom_left([x,y], ctx) == y
        if (
            check_xy_large_grey
            and check_x_center
            and check_y_dark_grey
            and check_y_southwest_x
        ):
            results.append([x,y])
    return results
